American Idol hasn't really produced someone that big since Carrie Underwood either. Â She was way back in season 4 and it went through 15 seasons. Â There were a few past her but not many and most of the recent winners never released a record or had much success. Â Will be interesting to see if that trend continues. Â The Voice will need to have a successful winner (hoping Chloe can break out) or else they may lose the better talent to shows like AI where they have a better chance at promotion/exposure.

(This season is a great example). Nevertheless, its a blessing in disguise for Miley to let go of Chloe so she can work with someone who has more faith in her artistry.
